description: Make this slow cooker mushroom risotto recipe when you're after something easy, creamy and comforting. It's a perfect meal for cooler weather.
name: Slow Cooker Mushroom Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove and discard thyme. Stir 1 cup parmesan into risotto and season. Serve risotto topped with remaining parmesan and extra thyme.
